body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting our customer service department. My name is Ronald Long and I represent Lux Auto Group. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Michelle. Can you please provide me with your phone number? I need to reach out to you directly.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my phone number is five five five - three two one - four zero nine eight.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you. And may I also have your home address? This will help us process your request more efficiently.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my home address is two zero zero Oak Street, Apartment two one zero, Cityville.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information, Michelle. Is there any additional information you would like to share with us about your experience with our dealership customer service?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm feeling confused about the warranty coverage on my recent purchase.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand the importance of clarity regarding warranty coverage. Thank you for bringing this to our attention. We will investigate and get back to you with a resolution. Thank you for your time, Michelle.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, Ronald. I appreciate your assistance.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Michelle. Have a great day!
